metadata.title: CVE-2016-5044 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The WRITE_UNALIGNED function in dwarf_elf_access.c in libdwarf before20160923 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds write and crash) via a crafted DWARF section.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
